reviews.review: The best game ever.Makes your logic work and the characters and story are just the best.Love it.
Una obra maestra en todo el sentido de la palabra. Un juego único, perfecto.
It's a really fun puzzle game and I'm sad I didn't start playing it earlier.
Nice Game. Must Add to the library !!!

coooooooooooooooooooooooooooolllllllll
das ansere commindty will ich spielen es ist noch nicht drausen

Portal 2, aparte de ser un clásico, es totalmente divertido y recomendable. Las pruebas imponen retos interesantes sin exagerar de la dificultad. También jugar con un amigo es divertido, porque a pesar de que las pruebas están hechas para apoyarse, muchas veces se encontraran riendo por sabotear el trabajo del otro.

Me fascina la mecanica del juego, y el coop player, es genial que tenga editor de mapas, aunque es tardado crear un mapa lo que encuentras de comunidad es calidad pura yo encontré un mapa en 4d fue increíble.
It's probably the best puzzle game ever
If you see a blue circle irl, dont walk into it! i learned the hard way
I really enjoyed this game, and suggest it for anyone that enjoys puzzle games, or just an incredible plot line. The developers of this game really new what they were doing
portal 2 is an amazing game i would highly recommend playing it
All out the best valve game, if you don't play the first game the story will be kind of meh but aside from that its still an amazing game.

This game needs to be re-released in VR.
It's better and longer than portal 1 but the puzzles are quite a bit easier. Good game and still relevant 10 years later
GOD! I REALLY REALLY REALLY WISH THEY WOULD MAKE A PORTAL 3!!
Before you buy: This is a game but 2
Great game, great story, make sure you play the first one first though!
I know I don't have that many hours of playing this game but I've played it on the PS3 almost my whole life so. It's pretty good get it
Gostei quando vc bota um portal em cima e um embaixo e vc acaba vomitando kkkkk
Amazing puzzle game with an attaching story that will make you want to replay it over and over.
Would highly reccomend to anyone as a first steam game. This game was a classic back when I was a kid and I think that anyone who gets a steam account must play it at least once.
Very good puzzle game but can be frustrating sometimes. DEFINITELY buy portal 1 first for the story.
Bizarre Earthquake çakması bir oyun sadece portal farklı o kadar onun dışında aynı yani, turkler yaptı bu oyunu terbiyesiz valve çalmış

희대의 명작. 말이 필요없다. 게이머라면 1편과 2편을 반드시 플레이해봐야한다. 게임성, 캐릭터, 스토리텔링, 연출, 음악 등 모든 부분에서 완벽한 게임은 정말로 보기 드물다. 그리고 포탈 2는 이 극히 드문 케이스에 해당한다. 이 게임을 해보지 않았다고? 그럼 말 그대로 인생 절반 손해본거다. 연식이 좀 된 게임이라 가격도 싸다. 당신이 3D멀미에 약한 사람이 아니라면, 지금 당장 해라.
Bardzo ciekawy i godny polecenia tytuł , najlepsza gra w jaką grałem:)

Obrigatório na sua Biblioteca
Incrível, Carnudo e o preço totalmente vale a pena

The base game is better than the first, amazing even. It is fun. Play it. 10/10
That is not what is important, however. I have ruined multiple lives and days in the “cooperative” mode and that is what 𝘳𝘦𝘢𝘭𝘭𝘺 matters. 11/10
Portal 2 is one of those games that I can go back and play again and again. I absolutely love it.

"hello my humans... 

i would like to tell you you will never get that update at all.. 

you know that  i love you... 

we've had some fun
oh you and i. 

you have some problems. 
20 straight hours of constantly play. 
you get so angrier when you cant figure out 
how to win. 

i know that you hate me... 
you started reading it just like i thought

tell the devs to please update the game
for you and i."
This game has great textures compared to most valve games and has a great story, in my opinion I don't think we need a portal 3
NICE GAME & great story! Love to see a Portal 3 soon! <3
单人剧情做的非常棒，多人也做的十分有意思，不愧是V社做的游戏，确实有新意。
Круче и дольше 1 части в 3 раза!!! РЕКАМЕНДУЮ!!!!!!!!!!

Крч игра топ, кто говорит что она так себе, тот в неё не играл, а я в неё играл, а потому скажу что она топ. Сюжет класс, графика класс, персы класс, я тоже класс (ибо я купил эту игру). Так шо, покупайте смело, рекомендую)
gotta play this again while waiting for portal 3
Great story feels like i am playing a movie.
This is the best game i have played in my entire lifetime.
Największą cechą tej gry jest to że pójdzie na każdy komputer. Do tego dochodzi wspaniała i ciekawa rozgrywka, fabuła która rozwija się z każdą minutą gry a tak że grafika.

Игра прекрасна и определённо стоит своих денег.
Однозначно всем советую поиграть в этот шедевр!
Sinceramente unos de los mejores juegos de aventura que he jugado hasta hoy, recomendable, y muy difícilmente entretenido 👍
Cudowna  gra logiczna z miłą dla oka oprawą graficzną i cudowną fabułą.

전편보다 기묘하고 음습한 느낌이 더 강해짐. 퍼즐의 종류도 다양해지고 난이도도 올라가서 도전욕구를 자극시켜준듯함.
코옵모드는 친구가 있어야만 할 수 있음. 그런데 친구가 없잖아
그래도 솔로 캠페인만큼 재미있는게 코옵 캠페인이기 때문에 주변 지인을 불러서 같이 하자.
